dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5766 IH: President Donald J. Trump Peace Prize Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Barr introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of State to annually award an honorary Trump Peace Prize.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the President Donald J. Trump Peace Prize Act.

subsection.text: The Secretary of State shall annually confer an honorary award, to be known as the Trump Peace Prize, on an individual who is a peacemaker.
The Secretary shall confer the first Trump Peace Prize on President Donald Trump.
